Figure (8)
UV-Visible absorption spectra for all 10 aromatic molecules, including the ﬁrst
two excited states. Thick lines correspond to the ML spectra predicted using the 10-molecule
model. Dotted lines represent the calculated spectra using the multiscale quantum chemical
method.
